document_data.name: Blood of the Vine
document_data.aliases:
Blood O' the Vine
Blood on the Vine
document_data.mainbody: '''Blood of the Vine''' was a shoddy tavern in the village of [[Barovia (village)|Barovia]], in the [[Domains of Dread|Domain of Dread]] of the [[Barovia|same name]].

Structure.Interior:
The tavern's central lounge contained a blazing hearth. Every door featured a stout bar that could be swung down to bar it against forceful intrusion. And additionally, its backrooms and upper rooms acted as guestrooms, with chimneys poking out from each of them.

The establishment overall was lacking in luxuries, but felt as comfortable as any home.

Services.Atmosphere: The tavern acted as a neutral meeting ground for [[vistani]] to gossip, trade, and pursue hobbies that their family members would disapprove of, such as gambling. Around night time local [[minstrel]]s would make their presence, serenading patrons with tragic ballads.

document_data.Inhabitants: The tavern was owned by three vistani sisters named [[Alenka]], [[Mirabel (Vistani)|Mirabel]], and [[Sorvia]]. They all saw to it that visitors paid their tabs. The bar itself was tended by a man named [[Arik Lorensk]].
